title: Solution to Odyssey missions: Add a PLAY button on the missions
body:
Like the title, just add a PLAY button on the mission description, and get into queue with the limitations of the mission.

Want to play 5 Yasuo, click the PLAY button on the mission and you cant change out of Yasuo on champion selection.

Want to play 4 augments, click the PLAY button on the mission and the extra slots will be blocked.
